resource.description: The AWS::NetworkManager::CustomerGatewayAssociation type associates a customer gateway with a device and optionally, with a link.

properties.name: GlobalNetworkId
properties.description: The ID of the global network.

type.description: The ID of the global network.

properties.name: CustomerGatewayArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the customer gateway.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the customer gateway.
